short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrapes data from LinkedIn Sales Navigator and updates extension state based on the page URL.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension is designed to enhance your experience on LinkedIn's Sales Navigator by enabling efficient data extraction and organization. With this tool, users can effortlessly scrape essential information about potential leads directly from Sales Navigator search results. Once the extension is installed, it provides intuitive controls to extract, view, and download the data in a user-friendly format. Key features include the ability to identify when you're on the appropriate LinkedIn page, scrape detailed lead information including names, titles, locations, and companies, and seamlessly navigate through multiple pages to gather comprehensive datasets. Additionally, the extension allows users to download the collected data as a CSV file for further analysis and integration into CRM systems. This extension is a must-have for sales professionals seeking to streamline their lead generation process and maximize the efficiency of their LinkedIn Sales Navigator usage. Install now to transform how you gather and manage your sales leads.
